name: Flagtag 1.0
author: Jeffikus

sections.description:
World Cup Soccer Time is here!

Buildings are decorated, streets bannered, cars socked and flagged and many faces are soon to be painted, but online? That place which holds so much of our attention? Not so much.

It’s time to fix that… it’s time to Spread The Feva!

We’ve created the perfect way to fast-track the release of pent-up patriotism by introducing The Flag Tag. With very little effort, you too can proudly sport the online equivalent of mirror-socks!
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin
  2. Login to your self-hosted WordPress site
  3. Go to Plugins->Add New
  4. Click the Upload button at the top of the page
  5. Browse and upload the zip file you just downloaded
  6. Activate the plugin when it asks you to
  7. Once activated, go to Settings->FlagTag to choose your Flag!

Or

  1. Download the plugin
  2. Extract the zip file
  3. Upload www-flagtag.php to your self-hosted WordPress site into the folder /wp-content/plugins/
  4. Login to your self-hosted WordPress site
  5. Go to Plugins
  6. Activate the FlagTag plugin
  7. Once activated, go to Settings->FlagTag to choose your Flag!
sections.faq:
Who built FlagTag?

White Wall Web built the FlagTag script, and Jeffikus built the WordPress plugin.
